post.desc:
I really dig the potential utility of the crystals. Imagine. One to shoot lasers. One to reflect damage. One to give her fire attribute. One to summon Bahamut. One to make her invisible. One to resurrect her. **One to destroy anything**...

Maybe that's what Flandre does in her basement and occasionally with Patchouli's help – making crystals with all the different enchantments.
